content.prompt: The choice of subject matter in the two paintings is best explained by which of the following historical developments during the artist’s life?

choices.label: The Netherlands' achievement of independence from the Habsburg Empire after the Thirty Years’ War
The establishment of religious toleration in the Netherlands after the Reformation
The poor harvests and other effects of the Little Ice Age in the seventeenth century
The growth of a wealthy trading elite in the Netherlands

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
